Package trabalho_pp.Data

Class APImethods

java.lang.Object
trabalho_pp.Data.APImethods
public class APImethods
extends java.lang.Object
Class responsible for the Json Methods implementation

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    APImethods()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static com.estg.core.AidBox[] importAidBoxes​(java.lang.String jsonString)
    We use the json library to get all the information about the existing aidboxes in the API, we create an array of AidBoxes with all the information and return.
    static void importMeasurements​(com.estg.core.Institution institution, java.lang.String jsonString)
    We use the json library to get all the information about the measurements in the API, we create an instance of MeasurementImpl with all the information and add them to the containers of the Institution.
    static void importToInstitution​(com.estg.core.Institution institution, java.lang.String aidboxesJSON)
    We create an array of aidboxes importing all aidboxes from json and we add them to the given institution.
    static com.estg.core.AidBox jsonToAidbox​(java.lang.String jsonString)
    We use the json library to get the information about an aid box and we create an instance of AidboxImpl with all the information.
    static com.estg.core.AidBox jsonToAidboxByCode​(java.lang.String code)
    This function returns an instance of aidbox, based on the information received by the api

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • jsonToAidbox

      public static com.estg.core.AidBox jsonToAidbox​(java.lang.String jsonString) throws ReadException
      We use the json library to get the information about an aid box and we create an instance of AidboxImpl with all the information.
      Parameters:
      jsonString - Json String that contains information about the aid box.
      Returns:
      AidBox
      Throws:
      ReadException - If the given aid box does not exist on the API.

    • importAidBoxes

      public static com.estg.core.AidBox[] importAidBoxes​(java.lang.String jsonString)
      We use the json library to get all the information about the existing aidboxes in the API, we create an array of AidBoxes with all the information and return.
      Parameters:
      jsonString - Json String that contains information about all the aidboxes.
      Returns:
      AidBox[]

    • importToInstitution

      public static void importToInstitution​(com.estg.core.Institution institution, java.lang.String aidboxesJSON)
      We create an array of aidboxes importing all aidboxes from json and we add them to the given institution.
      Parameters:
      institution - Given institution
      aidboxesJSON - Given string aid boxes json from API

    • importMeasurements

      public static void importMeasurements​(com.estg.core.Institution institution, java.lang.String jsonString)
      We use the json library to get all the information about the measurements in the API, we create an instance of MeasurementImpl with all the information and add them to the containers of the Institution.
      Parameters:
      institution - Institution
      jsonString - Json String that contains information about all the measurements.

    • jsonToAidboxByCode

      public static com.estg.core.AidBox jsonToAidboxByCode​(java.lang.String code) throws ReadException
      This function returns an instance of aidbox, based on the information received by the api
      Parameters:
      code - the code of an aidbox
      Returns:
      AidBox
      Throws:
      ReadException - if an error occurs while reading teh api imformation
